Row.Text: Mountain tiles can be worked for [icon:YIELD_FOOD]Food and [icon:YIELD_CULTURE]Culture with a Fürstabtei (Abby).

[LIST][LI]Mountain tiles can be worked for [icon:YIELD_FOOD]Food and [icon:YIELD_CULTURE]Culture with a Fürstabtei (Abby).[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Zytglogge (Clock Tower)[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the Swiss Confederacy's associated Wonder.
